content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To enable rich communication between EPAM Systems management, employees and Customers there is a decision to implement Skype for Business as a company's standard instant messaging tool till the time when it will be replaced with another tool.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Skype for Business functions allow calls from landline and cellular phones to Skype for Business and from Skype for Business to landline and cellular phones.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM computers should have Skype for Business installed from Soft Archive.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The procedure of Skype for Business deployment and usage rules are described
